title: "More people are playing ranked than before"
body:
Weird, its almost like you deleted Team Builder, Dominion, solo/duo queue and other selected play-lists options to choose from, which forces people into two options: ranked or a carbon copy of ranked.

Oh wait.

replies.body:
that round table discussion was such bullshit. i loved that "ranked games are less toxic now" shit too. of course they are!! premades are in skype and don't even bother communicating with us at all.

you'd think that people getting paid as much as these guys would understand that correlation /=/ causation. have you considered that people are playing ranked more now because they're guaranteed one of 2 roles? or that it's much easier to climb now because of promo helpers in low elo? or that, i don't know, a lot of the people enjoying dynamic queue only like it because they're bad and being dynamic boosted?

like, fuck, even people like scarra who flat out say "dynamic queue fucking sucks it's awful" are still playing it. what other options do we have? there's no competitive game mode anymore.
Well when soloQ was around everyone complained about the toxicity of soloQ ALL THE TIME. Now they fix thay and everyone wants to bring back the toxicity. How can you make people happy? You can't.

The new champ select on it's own would have lowered toxicity in solo queue. Riot didn't want to even bother waiting to see if it would help solo queue, instead they mixed the release of new champ select with DQ, which ended up confusing them together with most people.

That was pretty intentional because they knew that removing all old ranked systems and adding a normal+shown rank mode would go poorly.

Even their first few posts on the subject were intentionally misleading grouping them together.

Or they could work on Tribunal which might help solving toxicity while not deleting SoloQ.
Or they could keep both queues and those who want to beat toxicity by playing with friends will move to DynaQ.
Your post is the very correlation /=/ causation misunderstandance problem that he whom you commented to mentoins.

> it's all about having the option,

No, it's actually about the numbers.

Riot's data shows that ranked play has increased this season when the game was changed to dynamic queue with role selector.
The OP claims this is because other options, like Dominion, were removed, causing those players to move to the ranked queue.
But Dominion was removed because the number of people who played it were microscopic, they could not possibly account for a significant increase in the number of people playing ranked games.

More people playing ranked doesn't mean more people are enjoying it, or even necessarily playing it as a primary game mode.

It just means that more people are willing to try it since its going to feel like normals playing with friends.

It's a shame that we didn't instead try to find ways to increase average player skill and comfort, and see ranked numbers increase as people become better at playing and more comfortable.

If you have to destroy the ladder to get more people to participate, you're doing something wrong

I honestly don't see a correlation, the removal of team builder or dominion would "force" people to play blind or draft, more people play ranked because they now can play with 3 or 4 friends instead of only 5 or 2
